amendment.description: To strike reconciliation instructions requiring damaging cuts to programs critical to rural Americans and food assistance for American families.

vote.text: Amendment SA 957 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 84.

action.text: Amendment SA 957 proposed by Senator Lujan.
